title: Eden Loomis
author: Eden Loomis
created_time: May 23, 2022, 06:54:59 AMLast edit: May 31, 2022, 01:41:21 AM by Eden Loomis
content: Bingo Family Testing CampaignDear Bitcointalker,Bingo Family Closed Beta has finally been released. To upgrade the user experience as well as improve the features on the App and prepare for the launch of the official Game version, Bingo Family Team would like to announce the Testing Campaign for everyone to participate and earn up to 10.00$ rewards.‚è∞The event will take place from 21st May - 21st June, 2022Prize Pool____________________10.000$Serious bug: 500$/bug + 5 Bingo BoxNFT + 1000 BGOF TokenBig bug: 100$/bug + 3 Bingo BoxNFT + 500 BGOF TokenMedium bug: 50$/bug + 2 Bingo BoxNFT + 250 BGOF TokenSmall bug: 10$/bug + 1 Bingo BoxNFTNote:Each defect is only counted once. Late submissions will not be acceptedRegular and active Testers will receive additional rewards____________________10 bug: Add 100$20 bug: Add 200$Responsibilities____________________Develop test cases and execute manual testingDefine, record and report bugs and other site errorsEnter detailed, but concise, bugs into bug databaseRegress fixed bugs on each releaseBe prepared to provide insight about defectsSubmit screenshots or videos about bugs/errorsBrief carefully about the issue, explain how it came up, suggest some solutions and how to fix itHow to join?____________________Step 1: Submit in this form to participate in our campaign: Submit FormStep 2: Login to our Close Beta TestStep 3: Looking for bugs and send report in this form: Bugs ReportStep 4: Stay active and frequently check Telegram channels. After you submit, our team will pay a closer look at your answers. You can track the progress and results at SpreadsheetWhat you do?____________________Find bugs/errors (Any bug/errors is accepted)Make a test plan and test caseSubmit screenshots or videos about bugs/errorsBrief carefully about issue, explain how it came up, suggest some solutions and how to fix itPriorities____________________Suggest blockchain and crypto experienceUnderstanding of user personasAbility to execute thorough front-end functionality testingBack-end and web API testing capabilitiesAbility to document and troubleshoot errorsOrganizationSelf-motivated with strong team and interpersonal skills to work with developers, designers and product managersMultitaskingClose Beta Game Facebook Telegram Discord Medium TwitterInstagram Youtube Linkedin
